chart.practiceTrend.streak.light: Great job getting back into practice this week.
chart.practiceTrend.streak.medium: Nice momentum—two weeks of consistent practice.

chart.practiceTrend.tooltip.accuracyDelt: {arrow} {difference, number, decimal-1} pts vs. prior week
dashboard.alias.description: Set your leaderboard alias in profile settings to participate. Aliases are visible to peers and locked after first save.

dashboard.games.title: Games
dashboard.hero.summary.metrics: You've answered {questions, number} questions with {accuracy, number, percent} accuracy.
dashboard.hero.summary.start: Kick off your CHD prep with guided tutor mode sessions.
dashboard.metrics.refreshError: Unable to refresh automatically. Try again after checking your connection.
dashboard.metrics.refreshHint: Stats refresh automatically after you answer questions or play games.
dashboard.nextUp.description: Practice from a curated set of 250 CHD questions in tutor mode.
dashboard.nextUp.title: Next up
dashboard.progress.subtitle: Real-time metrics from tutor mode and learning games.
dashboard.progress.title: Your progress
dashboard.published.title: Published content
dashboard.trend.error: We couldn't load your recent practice. Try again shortly.
heatmap.summary: Aggregated across {weeklySpan, plural, one {# weekly bucket} other {# weekly buckets}} with {rowCount, plural, one {# question-week row} other {# question-week rows}}.
heatmap.title: Performance heatmap
practice.empty.description: Adjust your filters or try refreshing to start a new session.
practice.empty.title: No questions found
practice.error.title: We couldn’t load questions
practice.filters.sessionLength: {count, plural, one {# question session} other {# question session}}
practice.loading.description: We’re generating the next set of questions for you.
practice.loading.title: Loading practice session
practice.progress.counter: Q {current, number, integer} of {total, number, integer}
practice.sessionComplete.flagged: {count, plural, one {# question saved for spaced review.} other {# questions saved for spaced review.}}
practice.sessionComplete.noFlaggedDescri: Flag tricky items during practice so they’ll show up in your spaced-review queue.
practice.sessionComplete.reviewPrompt.af: tomorrow to lock in the learning.
practice.sessionComplete.summary: You worked through {count, plural, one {# question} other {# questions}} this round. Here’s how it went:
practice.sessionComplete.title: Session complete

review.feedback.correct: Great job! You got it correct.
review.feedback.incorrect: Not quite right. Review the explanation and try again.
